press-release-detail.title: Lincoln Electric Announces the Prism  Compact Air Filtration System
press-release-detail.subtitle: Less noise, lower costs and maximum results for welding and cutting applications
press-release-detail.description: – Lincoln Electric announces the newest system to the Prism® series—the Prism® Compact air filtration system for welding and cutting applications. The Prism Compact system introduces a compact design and quiet operation, while delivering quick and easy installation and maintenance to help promote a safe and healthy work environment.
